data.title: HVAC Services in Centerville, IN
data.meta_description: Dick Hill & Son is serving Centerville, IN. Offering high quality heating and cooling services and products. Click to learn more!
data.text:
Since 1953, Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning have been making their customers of Centerville, Indiana comfortable in their homes. We are a proud third-generation family-owned and operated company. The oldest family-owned HVAC company in Eastern Indiana!

Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning have been the best choice in the Centerville, Indiana area for residential and commercial heating and air conditioning sales, installation, service, and repair for more than 70 years. Whether you are looking for a gas furnace service or repair, quality installation of a Bryant high-efficiency furnace, heat pump, air conditioner, or better air quality in your Centerville, Indiana home. As a Bryant Factory Authorized Dealer you can be guaranteed we will do it right, the first time, whatever it takes.

With more than 70 years of experience in the industry, Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning’s friendly and professional technicians have the knowledge and skill necessary to provide you with complete professional maintenance and repair services. And we offer affordable quality service on all aspects of your residential and commercial HVAC systems, from a/c repair, furnace repair, oil furnace service as well as boilers. We also offer maintenance plans and Spring and Fall tune-up deals. Keeping your HVAC system running efficiently can return savings on your utility and repair bills. We offer an after-hours answering service. We repair all brands and models of central ac and furnaces including oil furnaces, gas furnaces, and boilers.

If you need a new air conditioning system or AC repair, Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air is here to help. We can provide all of the residential air conditioner services you may need; from air conditioner repair and air conditioner replacement to air conditioner recharging and air conditioner maintenance! We also work on all brands of home cooling equipment.

At Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning, we can customize heating and cooling options to your specific comfort levels and budget. Are there rooms in your Centerville, Indiana home that are colder or warmer than the rest of your home? Is the air too humid or maybe too dry? Are you allergic to pet dander, dust, or other irritants which may be present in the home’s air? Do the bills from heating your home in the winter or cooling your home in the summer get out of hand? Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning have the home heating and cooling solutions for you! Call us today for your free in-home estimate.

Ace Hardware Home Services Heating and Air Conditioning offer whole-house air purification systems, humidifiers as well as UV lamps from Bryant. Harmful bacteria, viruses, pollen, and mold can grow in moist heating and cooling systems, then circulate throughout your home. Bryant whole-home air purifiers treat 100% of the air flowing through your system before it circulates, to remove bacteria, viruses, pollen, and mold from the air. Bryant UV Lamps silently operate to attack and kill mold and bacteria enhancing your family’s comfort and health.
